DECLARE @ColorToolExists BIT
DECLARE @PanelExists BIT
DECLARE @ColorChipExists BIT
DECLARE @SpectralReadingExists BIT
DECLARE @SpectralMeasurementExists BIT
DECLARE @ColorCoordinateExists BIT
DECLARE @UserProfileExists BIT
DECLARE @AllTablesExist BIT

-- Check if COLOR_TOOL table exists
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'COLOR_TOOL' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo')
    SET @ColorToolExists = 1
ELSE
    SET @ColorToolExists = 0

-- Check if PANEL table exists
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'PANEL' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo')
    SET @PanelExists = 1
ELSE
    SET @PanelExists = 0

-- Check if COLOR_CHIP table exists
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'COLOR_CHIP' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo')
    SET @ColorChipExists = 1
ELSE
    SET @ColorChipExists = 0

-- Check if SPECTRAL_READING table exists
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'SPECTRAL_READING' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo')
    SET @SpectralReadingExists = 1
ELSE
    SET @SpectralReadingExists = 0

-- Check if SPECTRAL_MEASUREMENT table exists
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'SPECTRAL_MEASUREMENT' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo')
    SET @SpectralMeasurementExists = 1
ELSE
    SET @SpectralMeasurementExists = 0

-- Check if COLOR_COORDINATE table exists
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'COLOR_COORDINATE' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo')
    SET @ColorCoordinateExists = 1
ELSE
    SET @ColorCoordinateExists = 0

-- Check if USER_PROFILE table exists
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES WHERE TABLE_NAME = 'USER_PROFILE' AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'dbo')
    SET @UserProfileExists = 1
ELSE
    SET @UserProfileExists = 0

-- Determine if all tables exist
IF @ColorToolExists = 1 AND @PanelExists = 1 AND @ColorChipExists = 1 AND @SpectralReadingExists = 1 AND 
   @SpectralMeasurementExists = 1 AND @ColorCoordinateExists = 1 AND @UserProfileExists = 1
    SET @AllTablesExist = 1
ELSE
    SET @AllTablesExist = 0

-- Return the status
SELECT @AllTablesExist AS AllTablesExist
